message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $200 represents my ideal price, I could be willing to come down to $170. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
Alice,  $170 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to pay $140. This is a good deal for both of us, and I'm sure we can reach an agreement.
